translations.translation: Will you continue hewing houses from the mountains with exultant skill?
And dwellings hewed out of mountains ingeniously?
You hew dwellings in mountains and exult in that.
carving comfortable houses out of the mountains?
“And you carve out dwellings in the mountains, with skill?”
And you hew out in the mountains, houses with great skill."
And you hew houses out of the mountains exultingly;
Will you still skilfully hew houses out of the mountains?
Though ye hew out dwellings in the mountain, being skilful?
hewing out houses in the mountains and taking pride in your skill?
And hew ye out houses in the mountains skilfully! g
—while you skillfully hew out houses from the mountains?
And ye carve houses out of (rocky) mountains with great skill.
And you carve houses out of mountains with great skill.
Will you still hew your dwellings in the mountains?
And you skillfully carve houses in the mountains?
And you carve out of the mountains, homes, with skill.
[26:149] And you hew dwellings out of the mountains arrogantly (a variant reading [of farihīna, ‘arrogant’] has fārihīn, ‘skilfully’).
(Though ye hew out dwellings in the mountain, being skilful?) it is also said that this means: feeling proud of, and haughty about, your farms.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَتَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتاً فَارِهِينَ } معناه يَنحِتُهُا

translations.translation: And His saying, {And you carve out of the mountains homes, fearing} means that he carves them out.
